preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Changement de pansement", "Débridement/Excision", "Greffe de peau pleine ", "Insertion d'un cathéter central périphérique", "Insertion / retrait drain ou tube", "Manipulation sous anesthésie", "Bloc nerveux", "Enlèvement de sutures (pinces, etc.), peau", "Révision de cicatrice", "Collecte d'échantillons pour la microbiologie, écouvillon", "Drainage des plaies", "Débridement d'os", "Insertion VVC", "lambeau inguinal", "Incisions de décharge", "Pansement à la sulfadiazine", "Pansement à l'acétate de mafénide", "Pansement au gel de betadine", "Pansement àl'alginate de calcium", "Pansement humide à la betadine", "Hémostase aux fils de suture", "Hémostase au surgicel", "Hémostase au cauter ", "Lachage de fils de suture") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "ACS, Type d'intervention prévue");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Outcome of Type d'intervention prévue

changeSet.author: SreeKalyan

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Oui","Non","Ne sait pas") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "ACS, J'ai discuté les risques et bénéfices de l'anesthésie et ai répondu à toutes les questions?");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Outcome of J'ai discuté les risques et bénéfices de l'anesthésie et ai répondu à toutes les questions?

changeSet.author: SreeKalyan

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Aucun", "Hypertension", "Diabetes", "Asthme","Insuffisance Rénale","Epilepsie","Tuberculose pulmonaire","Autre pathologie cardiaque","Autre pathologie respiratoire","AVC","Autre") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "ACS, Antécédents médicaux");

changeSet.author: Pritam
changeSet.comment: updating datatypes for Date la consultation
changeSet.sql: update concept set datatype_id = (select concept_datatype_id from concept_datatype where name='Date') where concept_id =(select concept_id from concept_name where name ="ACS, Date la consultation" and concept_name_type='FULLY_SPECIFIED' and locale = 'fr');

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_name where name in ("Pansement à l'alginate de calcium");

changeSet.sql: update concept_name set name = "Pansement à l'alginate de calcium" where name ="Pansement àl'alginate de calcium";

changeSet.author: Pritam
changeSet.comment: deleteing existing reference terms
changeSet.sql: delete from concept_reference_map where concept_id in (select concept_id from concept_name where name in ("Manipulation sous anesthésie","Débridement d'os","Drainage des plaies","Révision de cicatrice","Manipulation sous anesthésie"));
